name: Big-data-tutorial
body:
###Big Data with Python Tutorial

Hello tutorial attendees!

Thanks for your interest in "Big Data with Python Tutorial", we are looking forward to the tutorial.

This tutorial will be highly interactive, and we'll go over a number of coding exercises as we go along. 

For this, you'll need a working Python environment with specific library versions and some data files.

###Instructions:

1- Here are the environment setup [instructions](https://docs.google.com/document/d/171NsTI0_ukWeROyV8CZ06tNAIekL47ePseD47n5yQiM/edit#). Shoot me an email if you run into problems!

2- Download the MovieLens 1M Data Set and unzip it into a 'data' subdir.

3- Download (or clone if you know git) the tutorial [repository](https://github.com/marcelcaraciolo/big-data-tutorial/). The handouts are in the pdf-exports subdir.


Marcel Caraciolo
@marcelcaraciolo OR marcel@caraciolo.com.br
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
